name: Dice Roll Puzzle
description:
A simple puzzle where you roll a dice to the target.

Inspired by the annoying puzzle in Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward where you need to roll a lot of dice into a pre-determined formation.

Estimated play time: 10 minutes
Play with keyboard only.

Note: This game does not contain sound or music; your speaker is not broken :p

Entry for GMTK Game Jam 2022
Theme: Roll of the Dice
